channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 13th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus footway closure needed please cut back overgrown overhanging hanging tree branches appropriately large tree adjacent to each other 30 meters by 4 meters high (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet
